name: LOGOS
description: Logos is a blockchain-based payment solution. Logos(Logos) stands for logical and universal laws of the universe, and will be used in various industries, starting with finance and games using Logos tokens on its own LOG-PAY platform, as well as travel and electronic commerce. The Logos project is forming LOGOS zones in travel-specialized areas in southeast Asia starting with Danang, Vietnam. LOG token is utilized in the following environments: * Offline LOGOS zone affiliates for payments. * Online investments to the LOGOS zone assets. * Metaverse LOGOS zone economy.
